document.full_text: indiana governor mitch daniels, who is considering whether to run for president, received 16 stitches to his forehead on friday after he was accidentally hit by a door at a gym, officials said.
document.title: indiana gov. daniels hit in head by door at gym
lines_and_colors: indiana governor mitch daniels, who is considering whether to run for president, received 16 stitches to his forehead on friday after he was accidentally hit by a door at a gym, officials said.
